result.optionC: Multiple threads mar cause deadlock,while multiple processes won't cause deadlock.
result.optionB: Changes to the main thread(cancellation，priority change，etc.) may affect the behavior of the other threads of the process; Changes to the parent process does not affect child processes.
result.optionA: Threads share the same address space of the parent process;Processes share the same address space of the parent process.
result.question: Which statement(s) is(are) correct about thread and process？
